name: __ECanBeCharacterBase
doc: Determines whether a Character can attempt to step up onto a component when they walk in to it.

ECB_No: Character cannot step up onto this Component.
ECB_Yes: Character can step up onto this Component.
ECB_Owner:
Owning actor determines whether character can step up onto this Component (default true unless overridden in code).
@see AActor::CanBeBaseForCharacter()
